00018 #include <math.h>
00019 #include <votca/tools/histogramnew.h>
00020 #include <votca/tools/tokenizer.h>
00021 #include <csgapplication.h>
00022 
00023 using namespace std;
00024 using namespace votca::csg;
00025 using namespace votca::tools;
00026 
00027 
00028 class CsgDensityApp
00029     : public CsgApplication
00030 {
00031     string ProgramName() { return "csg_density"; }
00032     void HelpText(ostream &out) { 
00033         out << "Calculates the mass density distribution along a box axis or radial density profile from reference point";
00034     }
00035 
00036     // some program options are added here
00037     void Initialize();
00038     
00039     // we want to process a trajectory
00040     bool DoTrajectory() {return true;}
00041     bool DoMapping() {return true;}
00042     bool DoMappingDefault(void) { return false; }
00043    
00044     // write out results in EndEvaluate
00045     void EndEvaluate();
00046     void BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology *top_atom);
00047     void EvalConfiguration(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref);
00048 
00049     bool EvaluateOptions() {
00050         CsgApplication::EvaluateOptions();
00051         CheckRequired("out", "no output topology specified");
00052         CheckRequired("trj", "no trajectory file specified");
00053         return true;
00054     };
00055 
00056 protected:
00057     string _filter, _out;
00058     HistogramNew _dist;
00059     double _rmax;
00060     int _nbin;
00061     double _scale;
00062     int _frames;
00063     vec _ref;
00064     vec _axis;
00065     string _axisname;
00066     string _molname;
00067     double _area;
00068 };
00069 
00070 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00071 {
00072     CsgDensityApp app;
00073     return app.Exec(argc, argv);
00074 }
00075 
00076 void CsgDensityApp::BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology *top_atom) {
00077 
00078      matrix box = top->getBox();
00079      vec a = box.getCol(0);
00080      vec b = box.getCol(1);
00081      vec c = box.getCol(2);
00082     
00083     _dist.setPeriodic(true);
00084     _axis=vec(0,0,0);
00085     _area=0;
00086     if(_axisname=="x") {
00087       _axis.setX(1);
00088       _rmax = abs(a);
00089       _area= abs(b^c);
00090     }
00091     else if(_axisname=="y") {
00092       _axis.setY(1);
00093        _rmax = abs(b);
00094       _area= abs(a^c);
00095     }
00096     else if(_axisname=="z") {
00097       _axis.setZ(1);
00098       _rmax = abs(c);
00099       _area= abs(a^b);
00100     }
00101     else if(_axisname=="r") {
00102       _dist.setPeriodic(false);
00103       _rmax = min(min(abs(a/2), abs(b/2)), abs(c/2));
00104     } else {
00105       throw std::runtime_error("unknown axis type");
00106     }
00107 
00108     if(OptionsMap().count("rmax"))
00109       _rmax = OptionsMap()["rmax"].as<double>();
00110 
00111     if (_axisname=="r") {
00112       if(!OptionsMap().count("reference"))
00113          _ref = a/2+b/2+c/2;
00114        cout << "Using referece point: " << _ref << endl;
00115     } 
00116     else if(OptionsMap().count("reference"))
00117         throw std::runtime_error("reference center can only be used in case of spherical density");
00118        
00119     _dist.Initialize(0, _rmax, _nbin);
00120     
00121     cout << "rmax: " << _rmax << endl;
00122     cout << "axis: " << _axisname << endl;
00123     cout << "Bins: " << _nbin << endl;
00124     _frames=0;
00125 
00126 }  
00127 
00128 void CsgDensityApp::EvalConfiguration(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref)
00129 {
00130     // loop over all molecules
00131     bool did_something = false;
00132     for(MoleculeContainer::iterator imol=top->Molecules().begin(); imol!=top->Molecules().end(); ++imol) {
00133         Molecule *mol = *imol;
00134         if(!wildcmp(_molname.c_str(),mol->getName().c_str())) 
00135             continue;
00136         int N = mol->BeadCount();
00137             for(int i=0; i<N; i++) {
00138                 Bead *b = mol->getBead(i);        
00139                 if(!wildcmp(_filter.c_str(), b->getName().c_str()))
00140                     continue;
00141                 double r;
00142                 if (_axisname=="r") {
00143                     r = abs(top->BCShortestConnection(_ref, b->getPos()));
00144                 } else {
00145                     r = b->getPos() *  _axis;
00146                 }
00147                 _dist.Process(r, b->getM());
00148                 did_something = true;
00149             }
00150     }
00151     _frames++;
00152     if (!did_something) throw std::runtime_error("No molecule in selection");
00153 }
00154 
00155 
00156 // output everything when processing frames is done
00157 void CsgDensityApp::EndEvaluate()
00158 {
00159   if (_axisname=="r") {
00160     _dist.data().y() = _scale/(_frames*_rmax/(double)_nbin *4*M_PI) * element_div( _dist.data().y(),
00161                    element_prod(_dist.data().x(), _dist.data().x()));
00162   } else {
00163     _dist.data().y() = _scale/((double)_frames * _area * _rmax/ (double)_nbin ) *_dist.data().y();
00164   }
00165   _dist.data().Save(_out);    
00166 }
00167 
00168 // add our user program options
00169 void CsgDensityApp::Initialize()
00170 {
00171     CsgApplication::Initialize();
00172     // add program option to pick molecule
00173     AddProgramOptions("Specific options:")
00174              ("axis", boost::program_options::value<string>(&_axisname)->default_value("r"), "[x|y|z|r] density axis (r=spherical)")
00175              ("bins", boost::program_options::value<int>(&_nbin)->default_value(50), "bins")
00176              ("out", boost::program_options::value<string>(&_out), "Output file")
00177              ("rmax", boost::program_options::value<double>(), "rmax (default for [r] =min of all box vectors/2, else l )")
00178              ("scale", boost::program_options::value<double>(&_scale)->default_value(1.0), "scale factor for the density")
00179              ("molname", boost::program_options::value<string>(&_molname)->default_value("*"), "molname")
00180              ("filter", boost::program_options::value<string>(&_filter)->default_value("*"), "filter bead names");
00181              //("ref", boost::program_options::value<&_ref>(), "reference zero point");
00182 }
